TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IHttpModule

summary.span: 為實作類別提供模組初始化和處置事件。

span.span: Provides module initialization and disposal events to the implementing class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 如需實作的自訂模組的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立和註冊自訂的 HTTP 模組](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7787d5be-40a4-4072-9075-c2b767428453)。For an example of a custom module that implements , see [Walkthrough: Creating and Registering a Custom HTTP Module](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7787d5be-40a4-4072-9075-c2b767428453).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 處置實作 之模組所使用的資源 (除了記憶體以外)。

span.span: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the module that implements .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法執行之前移除模組的任何最後的清除工作，從執行管線。The method performs any final cleanup work prior to removal of the module from the execution pipeline.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Init(class System.Web.HttpApplication context) cil managed

param.name: context
param.span: ，提供 ASP.NET 應用程式中所有應用程式物件通用的方法、屬性和事件的存取權。

span.span: An that provides access to the methods, properties, and events common to all application objects within an ASP.NET application

summary.span: 初始化模組，並準備該模組以處理要求。

span.span: Initializes a module and prepares it to handle requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用註冊事件處理方法向特定事件的方法。Use the method to register event handling methods with specific events. ## Examples 如需實作的自訂模組的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立和註冊自訂的 HTTP 模組](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7787d5be-40a4-4072-9075-c2b767428453)。For an example of a custom module that implements , see [Walkthrough: Creating and Registering a Custom HTTP Module](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7787d5be-40a4-4072-9075-c2b767428453).
